review: I love the Apple TV.  This was my second one I have purchased in the last year for another TV.  It has a lot of applications that can be used and most would say that it is not as good because you cannot install certain apps.  If you are an Apple fan this product is great because you can stream anything you want from your iPhone, Apple computer or iPad through this device.  So really people that criticize this device because it does not have an application like Amazon Prime it doesn't really matter because you can use it through any of the devices I mentioned by AirPlay.  You can also mirror the iPhone which is great because you can play your favorite games on your TV.  Plus if you purchase movies and music through iTunes you have access to your entire library.
author: timothy r houk jr

review: This is Apple TV 3 Rev A A1469 the most recent model, sealed brand new. Prime account got it to me in 2 days flat. Great streaming, and a must for ipad and iphone users. If you use android go with kindle for hd.
